name: Let It Happen
description:
Let It Happen is a physics-simulation game inspired by recent democratic protests in Russia.

Organize a rally at the Square of Reconciliation among the fortress walls, skyscrapers and panel buildings. Place the protesters and police, click on Let It Happen! and enjoy the show. Protesters soar up, policemen drag them down and everything is controlled by the physics of Unreal Engine 4 and glitches a bit.

Features:


  • Plenty of locations to explore
  • References to Russian protest movement and symbols of the last decade: colored balaclavas, rubber ducks, Alexsei Navalniy’s agitation cubes, cheerful guys from the Party of the Dead, ecologists, feminists
  • A powerful audio system helps you to turn a rally into a concert, a disco or a session of communication with aliens
  • Fly a drone to document your rally
  • You can knock down police fences, destroy metal detectors, get Lenin busted
  • City center and outskirts, parks, canals, boulevards and Parnas-city are free to walk around
